pages.title: Description
pages.text: The Dead Wolf is a tamable mob that can be ridden. $(br)Locations:§1 Dead Zone$(br)Variants: $(li)§1Wild $(li)§1Angry $(li)§1Tamed $(br)Favorite Food:§1 Magic Food$(br)Size:§1 2x scale $(br)Weapon: §1N/A$(br)Hostility:§1 Neutral unless §1provoked$(br)Health:§1 10,000 (Tamed: 50,000) $(br)Damage:§1 2 (Tamed: 4) $(br)Tier:§1 2
